description:
Part A: One day, Momo asks Chio-chan and Manana if they’d eat some sweets with her.
Part B: Chio-chan is walking to school by herself when she spots the little girl she had a duel with before.
Part C: Andou and George have a little adventure.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Momo et la teneur en sucre / Mille printemps / Andô et George
Shinozuka, Zucker und Pressekonferenz / Tausend Frühlinge / Ando und Georgie
Shinozuka-san to Toubun to Kishakaiken / Thousand Spring / Andou to George
Shinozuka-san, Sugar Content, and the Press Conference / Thousand Spring / Andou and George
篠塚さんと糖分と記者会見 / サウンザンドスプリング / 安藤とジョージ
